bug.short_desc: Quickfix to remove Bundle-Activator if there's no lazy start

long_desc.thetext: This is an enhancement for part of the work in bug 209432
I'll take care if it's not taken

Here's a context for your Bartosz. Look at RemoveUnknownExecEnvironments as an example.
Thanks, it should be very straightforward.
Created attachment 86050 fix with separate resolution classes
Created attachment 86053 patch with single class for both quick fixes

Created attachment 86056 pde.patch
I decided to just use the remove resolution as the disable one was effectively the same thing.
I also got rid of the modelChangedEvent addition, that wasn't necessary. See the updated patch to learn why :)

attachment.desc: patch with single class for both quick fixes
